name: Snail Racing
overview: A shareware racing game for one to 4 competitive players created by Supurb Simulations. In the Feeding Game mode, you select which foods your snail gets to eat in the five days before a race: sugar, crisps, lettuce, cabbage, or apple. I did not understand how the different foods influence the performance of the snail. The manual says it is up to the players to figure that out.
